task_description: 生成Q版3D卡通风格的烤鸡腿ICON，金黄诱人，圆润可爱，具有Pixar卡通美学和商业级质量

input_data.text_prompt: A cute 3D rendered chicken drumstick icon in Pixar cartoon style, Q-version adorable design. Golden-brown crispy skin with glossy shine (#FFB347, #FFA500), caramel-colored grill marks (#8B4513), white highlights (#FFFFFF), beige bone part at bottom (#F5F5DC). Round and plump shape, slightly tapered from top to bottom. High-gloss plastic/ceramic texture with appetizing sheen. Clear visible bone part. 3/4 front view angle, slightly tilted. Pure white or transparent background. Top and 45-degree front dual lighting. Professional 3D rendering, ultra-high resolution, commercial food photography quality, appetizing and delicious appearance.
design_requirements: Q版可爱，圆润饱满的鸡腿造型
金黄色外皮，焦糖色烤痕，高光质感
表面油亮光泽，略带烤制纹理
双光源照明（顶部+前方45度）
input_data.negative_prompt: flat, 2D, realistic photo, blurry, low quality, distorted shape, dull colors, no highlights, messy background, poor lighting

metadata.notes: 3D卡通风格鸡腿ICON，参考input/吼巷/设计/IP/微信图片_20250923171141_52_171.png风格
